00051     template<class T>
00052     class PipeQueueConsumer {
00053     public:
00054         PipeQueueConsumer(int fd_in, int fd_out, const std::string&name):
00055             fd_in(fd_in), fd_out(fd_out), name(name), lastObject(0) {}
00056         ~PipeQueueConsumer() { close(fd_in); close(fd_out); }
00057 
00058         vector<const T*> freeze();
00059         vector<const T*> content();
00060         const T* last();
00061         void keep(const T*t);
00062 
00063         vector<const T*> toKeep;
00064     private:
00065         int fd_in, fd_out;
00066         std::string name;
00067         vector<const T*> current;
00068 
00069         void flushOld(const vector<const T*>&v);
00070         vector<const T*> downloadNew();
00071         const T* lastObject;
00072 
00073         void flushPipeBuffer();
00074         deque<const T*> pipe_buffer;
00075 
00076         void debug_vector(const char*, const vector<const T*>&v);
00077         void debug_deque(const char*, const deque<const T*>&v);
00078         void debug_pointer(const char*, const T*);
00079     };
00080 
00090     template<class T> class PipeQueue {
00091     public:
00092         PipeQueue(const std::string& name): name(name) {}
00093         virtual ~PipeQueue() { }
00094 
00096         PipeQueueConsumer<T> *createConsumer(const std::string&name, Stack w);
00097 
00099         size_t push(T*ob, Stack w);
00100 
00102         size_t size();
00103 
00106         void gc(Stack w);
00107 
00109         void deleteConsumer(PipeQueueConsumer<T>*c, Stack w);
00110 
00114         void setSignalSemaphore(PipeQueueConsumer<T>*c, PosixConstructs::PosixSemaphore* semaphore);
00115 
00117         bool hasSignalSemaphore(PipeQueueConsumer<T>*c);
00118 
00120         void setInterests(PipeQueueConsumer<T>*c, MyInterests<T>*interests);
00121 
00122         virtual void push_callback(PipeQueueConsumer<T>*) { }
00123 
00124     private:
00125         // This mutex is for the following data structures
00126         PosixConstructs::PosixMutex mutex;
00127         // Reference counting
00128         typedef std::map<T*,int> Ptr2ref;
00129         Ptr2ref ptr2ref;
00130         // Subscriptions
00131         struct Subscription {
00132             int fd_in; int fd_out;
00133             MyInterests<T>*interests;
00134             PosixConstructs::PosixSemaphore *semaphore;
00135             // If the pipe is full, objects are accumulated here
00136             std::deque<const T*> buffer;
00137             string name;
00138         };
00139         typedef std::map<PipeQueueConsumer<T>*,Subscription> Con2sub;
00140         Con2sub subscriptions;
00141         std::string name;
00142     };
